long_description: The durable GSI Nesting wineglass is easy to pack along on campouts or picnics. Made of copolyester plastic, the nesting wineglass provides excellent impact resistance and is suitable for both warm and cold beverages. Copolyester is BPA-free. Glass unscrews at the midpoint of the stem so that the base can be snapped into the bowl for easy packing and storage. Hand wash in warm water with a mild dishwashing detergent.
short_description: The durable GSI Nesting wineglass is easy to pack along on campouts or picnics.
